content:
We're starting work on the @topic mention feature in parallel with the Follow topics feature.

I went through the previous issues #22829 #20497 #3750

I would like to discuss one thing. (It isn't clear to me from previous discussions and the issue description.)

  1. Are we going to have a separate row in the Notifications triggers table for the @topic mention? -- Users can configure whether they want email/push/desktop/audible notification for @topic mention.
  2. It will have similar behavior as that of @all, with the only difference being that "the users to be notified will be the participants of the topic only".

Which of the two is the expected behavior here?

cc: Tim Abbott Alya Abbott @Abhijeet Bodas
For v1, I think it would be fine to have a single setting for @all, @everyone and @topic, which is the setting which we have right now. That way, no new rows/columns need to be added to the matrix.
Yeah, that's what I was thinking as well.
Abhijeet Bodas mentioned this topic in #design > notification emails.
